frontmatter.title: Marry Someone Pretty
frontmatter.description: This one is for the ladies. If you were ever made to feel vain for wanting to date someone pretty, you shouldn't. There's science that proves it will make for a better relationship.
keywords: is physical attraction important in a relationship
should I date someone I'm not attracted to
